pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Quantified Implementation of the Kraljic Matrix // Implements a quantified approach to the Kraljic Matrix (Kraljic, 1983, https://hbr.org/1983/09/purchasing-must-become-supply- management) for strategically analyzing a firms purchasing portfolio. It combines multi-objective decision analysis to measure purchasing characteristics and uses this information to place products and services within the Kraljic Matrix.
